item.description:
Let's meet at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub for the thirteenth regular season game.  Rough loss for the Bears last week.  I think it was said that the Bears left 26 points on the board.  This has pretty much become a must win game, so hopefully the offense gets its act together,  so come on out and cheer on your Bears!

 

About the Courtside Restaurant and Pub

Courtside Restaurant and Pub have 12 HD TV's and they have the NFL SUNDAY TICKET. They seat over 200 people.

http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/

Menu:

http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/menu.htm

Directions:

Courtside Restaurant and Pub is located 2 blocks from Leachmere T Station. They also have free parking in their lot. http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/map.htm
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the restaurant part, loo for people wearing Bears gear.

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Week 14 Football: Bears @ Tebow Disciples
